items.content: Janam:- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheythu nyangalle sahaayikkaname.

Parishuddhanmaaril sthhithicheyyunna parishuddhanum, adyashyanaaya nithyanum, prakrthyaa nallavanum, poornnaprabalanum, praabalyamulllla adhikaariyum, thante pithaavinodu saaraamshatthil onnaayi sthhithicheyyunnavanum, thanne prasavicha maathaavine uyartthukayum, thanne snehicha shuddhimaanmaareyum, shuddhimathikalleyum vallartthukayum cheytha sarvvashakthanumaaya kartthaavinu sthuthi. Thanikku ... Bkulahoon ... Aammeen.

Karunayulllla kartthaave! Ninte maathaavinteyum parishuddhanmaarudeyum praarththhanakall moolam, paapikallaaya nyangallkku paapamochanam nalkaname. Aathmashareerangallude karakallilninnu nyangalle vedippaakkaname. Ninte athyunnathamaaya daivathvatthinu preethikaramaayirikkunna sakalattheyum, ninnodulllla bhakthi moolam vedippilum vishuddhiyilum anushdhippaan nyangalle padhippikkaname. Ninte parishuddhanmaarude avakaashatthil nyangalle chertthukollllaname. Avarodonnichu ninakku nyangall keertthanangall paadukayum, neethiyin kireedangallaal prathidaananaa mukallil alangkarikkappedukayum cheyyaname. Kunyaadukalle ninte valathubhaagatthum, pallllaadukalle ninte idathu bhaagatthum nirtthumpoll, nyangalleyum nyangallude marichupoyavareyum, ninte kunyaadukallodonnichu cherkkaname. Nyangallude maathaapithaakkallkkum, sahodaree sahodarangallkkum, gurukkanmaarkkum, vishvaasikallaaya ellaa marichupoyavarkkum nalla ormmayundaakkaname. Nyangallum avarum ninte valathubhaagatthu ninnu ninne kaanukayum, ninakkum, ninte pithaavinum, jeevan nalkunna vishuddharoohaaykkum, ippozhum ellaayppozhum sthuthiyum sthothravum samarppikkukayum cheyyumaaraa kaname. Hosho ... Aammeen.

content:
Daivatthe pettoru maathaavaam
Mariyaamettam vaazh/u200bvettoll
Daivika kunyaadineyaashcharyam
Than madiyil thaalolichaall
/tghoraagniprabhayum theekshna
/tjvaalayumeshaay/u200bvaan eeshan
/tveeryatthaalavalle thaangi
Krobedootharathhatthinmel
Ereedunnone ettaall.

Athbhuthamaam phalamekum vrksham
Karkkashamaam shila meenevam
Paashaandarkkethire drshdaantam
moonnennam sabha kaattunnu.
/tkunyaadine vrksham nalki.
/ttheekkalppaara jalam nalki,
/testheeraa mathsyavumeki;
Kanyaakshepakare moonnum
Parihaasatthodu veekshippu.

Dhanye! Nin praarththhana mevatte nyangallodonni
Charththhana kettittekeedatte punyam naathhan.

Entaunnathyam bhaumika puthrikkundaayennu
Chonneedum nyaan sambhramamaarnnittathbhuthapoorvvam.

Thrkkaarunyam suthane thaazhtthi savidhe chertthu;
Daivasuthan than maathaavaakaan thiruhithamaarnnaall.

saumyarilallaathengamarum nyaan ennura cheython
Jaatharilettam thaazhmappettullllavallil paartthaan

Ompathu maasam ninne ettoll than praarththhanayaal
Daivaathmajane! Kopatthin dandozhivaakkenam.
